column3: School of Social Sciences, Humanities & Law
column5: The MSc Evidence-Based Policing enables policing graduates, those professionals working within the police service, or other relevant agencies, and those with degrees in another discipline, to continue professional and/or personal development by exploration of evidence-based policing.You acquire and develop recognised subject-specific knowledge and understanding, and cognitive, intellectual, practical, professional and generic key skills and qualities. You also effectively plan, manage and evaluate your own learning to become an independent life-long learner.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
